contents.name: DeviceName
contents.description: Name of the device of the diagnostic data.

description: Data of the access on one or more AutoID Identifier.

schemas.description: Result values of an AutoID Identifier access.

contents.name: Client
contents.description: Client which was the originator of the command.

description: Data of the access on one or more Rfid Transponder.

contents.name: DeviceLocationName
contents.description: Symbolic name of the device location.

contents.name: DeviceName
contents.description: Default could be also host name, IP address or MAC. This should be a field that can be configured for a device.

contents.name: LastScanTimestamp
contents.description: Point of time the last AutoID Identifier was scanned.

contents.description: ID of the antenna with which the last AutoID Identifier was scanned.

contents.name: LastScanRSSI
contents.description: RSSI Value with which the last AutoID Identifier was scanned.
